entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
